languages.text: "Так точно, Ваш высокобродие! Это повстанцы проклятые — они, гады, разжились где-то зенитным орудием, от которого нашим шаттлам никакого житья нет. Жутко мощная штука! Вам еще повезло, что не попали — на моих глазах два челнока с подкреплением спалили, никто не выжил".

"Affirmative, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}! It's all those damned rebels — those maggots somehow got their hands on an anti-aircraft battery and it's causing our shuttles no end of trouble. That thing really packs a punch! You're lucky they missed you — I've seen them fry two shuttles carrying reinforcements, not a soul survived."
languages.original_text: "Так точно, Ваш высокобродие! Это повстанцы проклятые — они, гады, разжились где-то зенитным орудием, от которого нашим шаттлам никакого житья нет. Жутко мощная штука! Вам еще повезло, что не попали — на моих глазах два челнока с подкреплением спалили, никто не выжил".

traits.locale_text: "Affirmative, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}! It's all those damned rebels — those maggots somehow got their hands on a cannon that causes our shuttles no end of trouble. That thing really packs a punch! You're lucky they missed you — I've seen them fry two shuttles carrying reinforcements, not a soul survived."

"Affirmative, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}! It's all those damned rebels — those maggots somehow got their hands on a cannon that causes our shuttles no end of trouble. That thing really packs a punch! You're lucky they missed you — I've seen them fry two shuttles carrying reinforcements, not a soul survived."

"Affirmative, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}! It's all those damned rebels — those maggots somehow got their hands on a cannon that causes our shuttles trouble with no end. That thing really packs a punch! You're lucky they missed you — I've seen them fry two shuttles carrying reinforcements, not a soul survived."

"Affirmative, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}! It's all those damned rebels — those maggots somehow got their hands on a cannon that causes our shuttles trouble with no end. That thing really packs a punch! You're lucky they missed you — I've seen them fry two shuttles carrying reinforcements, not a soul survived."

"Affirmative, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}! It's all those damned rebels — those maggots somehow got their hands on an anti-aircraft battery and it's causing our shuttles no end of trouble. That thing really packs a punch! You're lucky they missed you — I've seen them fry two shuttles carrying reinforcements, not a soul survived."

"Affirmative, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}! It's all those damned rebels — those maggots somehow got their hands on a cannon that causes our shuttles trouble with no end. That thing really packs a punch! You're lucky they missed you — I've seen them fry two shuttles carrying reinforcements, not a soul survived."

languages.text: "Jawohl, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, {mf|Sir|Madam}! Es sind diese verfluchten Rebellen. Diese Würmer haben irgendwie eine Flugabwehrbatterie in die Finger bekommen und stellen unsere Shuttles vor gewaltige Probleme. Das Ding hat richtig Wumms! Ihr habt Glück, dass sie Euch nicht getroffen haben. Ich habe sie schon zwei Shuttles mit Verstärkung abschießen sehen, es hat niemand überlebt."
languages.original_text: "Affirmative, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}! It's all those damned rebels — those maggots somehow got their hands on an anti-aircraft battery and it's causing our shuttles no end of trouble. That thing really packs a punch! You're lucky they missed you — I've seen them fry two shuttles carrying reinforcements, not a soul survived."

traits.locale_text: "Jawohl, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, {mf|Sir|Madam}! Es sind diese verfluchten Rebellen. Diese Würmer haben irgendwo eine Kanone in die Finger bekommen, die unseren Shuttles endlosen Ärger bereitet. Das Ding hat richtig Wumms! Ihr habt Glück, dass sie Euch nicht getroffen haben, ich habe sie schon zwei Shuttles mit Verstärkung abschießen sehen, es hat niemand überlebt."

languages.text: « Affirmatif, Votre Seigneurie ! Ce sont ces foutus rebelles... Cette vermine a réussi à mettre la main sur une batterie antiaérienne et depuis, ils mènent la vie dure à nos navettes. Faut dire que c'est du gros calibre ! Vous avez du bol qu'ils vous aient {mf|manqué|manquée}, je les ai vus descendre deux navettes de renforts... Aucun survivant. »
languages.original_text: "Affirmative, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}! It's all those damned rebels — those maggots somehow got their hands on an anti-aircraft battery and it's causing our shuttles no end of trouble. That thing really packs a punch! You're lucky they missed you — I've seen them fry two shuttles carrying reinforcements, not a soul survived."

traits.locale_text: « Affirmatif, Votre Seigneurie ! Ce sont ces foutus rebelles... Cette vermine a réussi à mettre la main sur un canon et depuis, ils mènent la vie dure à nos navettes. Il faut dire que c'est du gros calibre ! Vous avez de la chance qu'ils vous aient {mf|manqué|manquée}, je les ai vus abattre deux navettes de renforts... Aucun survivant. »

languages.text: “我同意您的话，大人！都是那些该死的叛军！那群臭蛆不知从哪里弄来了一门防空炮，给我们的穿梭机造成了没完没了的麻烦。那玩意儿威力可真大！还好他们没打中您。我亲眼见过他们击中了两架运送援军的穿梭机，上面的所有人当场完蛋了。”
languages.original_text: "Affirmative, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}! It's all those damned rebels — those maggots somehow got their hands on an anti-aircraft battery and it's causing our shuttles no end of trouble. That thing really packs a punch! You're lucky they missed you — I've seen them fry two shuttles carrying reinforcements, not a soul survived."

traits.locale_text: “我同意您的话，大人！都是那些该死的叛军！那群臭蛆不知从哪里弄来了一门大炮，给我们的穿梭机造成了没完没了的麻烦。那玩意儿威力可真大！还好他们没打中您。我亲眼见过他们击中了两架运送援军的穿梭机，上面的所有人当场完蛋了。”

languages.text: 「その通りであります、陛下！全てあの忌々しい反乱者共のせいだ…あのウジ虫共は、どこかで対空砲を手に入れて、我々のシャトルを延々と妨害しています。本当に凄まじい威力なのです！陛下が餌食にならずに済んでよかったです…援軍を乗せた2隻のシャトルが撃墜されたのですが、生き残った者はひとりもいません」
languages.original_text: "Affirmative, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}! It's all those damned rebels — those maggots somehow got their hands on an anti-aircraft battery and it's causing our shuttles no end of trouble. That thing really packs a punch! You're lucky they missed you — I've seen them fry two shuttles carrying reinforcements, not a soul survived."

traits.locale_text: 「その通りであります、陛下！全てあの忌々しい反乱者共のせいだ…あのウジ虫共は、どこかで大砲を手に入れて、我々のシャトルを延々と妨害しています。本当に凄まじい威力なのです！あなたが餌食にならずに済んでよかったです…援軍を乗せた2隻のシャトルが墜落されたのですが、生き残った者はひとりもいません」

languages.text: «¡Afirmativo, mi{mf|lord|lady}, señor{mf||a}! Es todo culpa de los malditos rebeldes. Han capturado una batería antiaérea y está causando estragos entre las lanzaderas. ¡Es muy potente! Tiene suerte de que no le hayan dado. Les he visto freír dos lanzaderas con refuerzos y no ha sobrevivido ni un alma».
languages.original_text: "Affirmative, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}! It's all those damned rebels — those maggots somehow got their hands on an anti-aircraft battery and it's causing our shuttles no end of trouble. That thing really packs a punch! You're lucky they missed you — I've seen them fry two shuttles carrying reinforcements, not a soul survived."

traits.locale_text: «¡Afirmativo, mi{mf|lord|lady}! Son esos malditos rebeldes, esos gusanos de alguna manera pusieron sus manos en un cañón que causa a nuestras lanzaderas problemas interminables. ¡Esa cosa sí que pega fuerte! Tiene suerte de que no le hayan dado. Les he visto freír dos lanzaderas con refuerzos y no ha sobrevivido ni un alma».

languages.text: "Doğrudur {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Hep o lanet isyancılar yüzünden. Pislikler bir şekilde ellerine bir havasavar bataryası geçirmiş, dur durak bilmeden mekiklerimize sıkıyor. Esaslı da bir batarya! Şanslısınız ki sizi ıskalamışlar. Takviye taşıyan iki mekiği küle döndürmelerine bizzat şahit oldum, bir kişi bile sağ çıkamadı."
languages.original_text: "Affirmative, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, {mf|sir|ma'am}! It's all those damned rebels — those maggots somehow got their hands on an anti-aircraft battery and it's causing our shuttles no end of trouble. That thing really packs a punch! You're lucky they missed you — I've seen them fry two shuttles carrying reinforcements, not a soul survived."

traits.locale_text: "Doğrudur {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Hep o lanet isyancılar yüzünden. Pislikler bir şekilde ellerine bir havasavar bataryası geçirmiş, dur durak bilmeden mekiklerimize sıkıyor. Esaslı da bir batarya! Şanslısınız ki sizi ıskalamışlar. Takviye taşıyan iki mekiği küle döndürmelerine bizzat şahit oldum, bir kişi bile sağ çıkamadı."
